website_summaries.verdict: KEEN’s Terradora Leather Mid WP made its mark in the hiking community through its admirable features. Those who are looking for a mid-top boot that’s lightweight and comfortable may find this pair interesting.On the flip side, it missed to impress with its somewhat unconvincing outsole. By and large, the Terradora Leather Mid Waterproof offers advantages that will benefit hikers on their outdoor adventures.
pros: Numerous wearers loved how the KEEN Terradora Leather Mid Waterproof fits
It required virtually no breaking in, according to a bunch of owners
A majority of hikers attested to the breathability of the pair
The comfort provided by the KEEN Terradora Leather Mid Waterproof was gratifying
A portion of those who bought the boots stated that it protected their feet from getting wet
It delivered ample arch support, based on a handful of customer reviews
Some users appreciated the low weight of this boot
cons: A couple of online buyers had to return the Terradora Leather Mid Waterproof because of its thin sole

customer_reviews.title: Fantastically comfortable and actually waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Adore these boots. Like an idiot I went on my first hike without breaking them in and luckily I got away with it! They are so comfortable, have excellent support for my high arches, and are genuinely waterproof. Many of the hiking boots advertised as waterproof don't stand up to a hill walk in Scotland but these walked me straight into Loch Lomond and kept my feet nice and dry. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kasen Eilis Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Great product are comfortable and fit well!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Man and I have purchased 'Ladies' boots! Yes that is right! I do a lot of dog walking and need good shoes or boots. I noticed that my daughter, who is also very active with a pair (same foot size as me), liked the look and tried them on.......perfect fit. I have fairly slender feet and have problems in the past with boots being too big. These are great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Freddie's Dad.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight walking boots!
customer_reviews.text: After a little bit of research I decided on these boots prior to a walking holiday...and am absolutely chuffed to bits with them. Although I’m a male, size 8, these boots fit me perfectly. They have excellent soles and ankle support, they are light weight ( which is what I wanted more than anything, I wear steel toe capped boots for work all day and hence have a strong dislike for heavy boots in my leisure time! ) Returned from holiday and these boots were amazing, still as good as new after really being put through their paces, can’t really recommend strongly enough.
customer_reviews.author: paul newman

customer_reviews.title: 5 star boots indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Having spent the summer walking the dog in my Allbirds trainers I wants to find some boots that were just as comfortable. Having tried several I ordered these as they are the same make as my walking sandals, which have also proved comfortable. Straight from the box they are a good fit and with some new, anti blister socks they've proved to be just the job! Very happy (finally)
customer_reviews.author: Gail Parker

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, but on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely walking boots which I ordered on advice from my local Blacks store as I have very wide feet. I measure a 5 but usually go for a six due to the width, but the 6 in this boot was far too small and unfortunately I couldn't get the 7 (I did follow the sizing guide on the website). My local Blacks and Millets stores were so helpful and I was able to exchange these boots for some Merrell boots that fitted better.
customer_reviews.author: Proudmumofthree

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. They fit well are lightweight and comfy, they even look better than in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Lovely light boot.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a spring holiday these boots didn’t take any breaking in. Waterproof - so far! Lovely to wear and light in weight. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: crazy jane

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is accurate
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered a half size bigger, however these were too big. A new pair promptly arrived. The fit and comfort is great although not with thick socks. The boots are lightweight and great for warmer weather hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Edwards

customer_reviews.title: The comfiest shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly, these are so comfy. My feet love them - thanks shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant buy
customer_reviews.text: Like wearing slippers 12hrs on my feet and just great
customer_reviews.author: graham linington

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great comfy boots, no breaking in needed Nd useable straight out the box for a 10 mile walk and sure enough we’re waterproof! . Only took a star off as the make a bit of a noise when you are walking.. not sure how to describe it but it’s a little bit annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: KEEN Women's Terradora Mid En Cuir, Imperméable High Rise Hiking Shoes
product_meta.description:
Hit your fitness goals all year round with this performance hiking shoe, crafted of waterproof leather to keep moisture and debris at bay. The women's-specific design offers instant—and enduring—comfort.
- KEEN.Dry waterproof, breathable membrane
- Molded collar for comfort
- Cushion panel takes pressure off the achilles
- Women's specific fit
- ESS shank offers lightweight support
